**Authors:** Wolf McNally, Christopher Allen, Blockchain Commons</br>
**Revised:** Dec 6, 2022</br>
**Status:** DRAFT

* [Appendix B: Envelope Test Vectors](12-B-ENVELOPE-TEST-VECTORS.md)
* Appendix C: Envelope SSKR Test Vectors: This document

---

## Introduction

This document provides test vectors for scenarios where `envelope` is used with SSKR to shard and recover secrets of any size. It is generated by `SSKREnvelopeTestVectors.testGenerateSSKREnvelopeTestVectors()` in the `BCSwiftSecureComponents` test suite.

## Status

This document is a draft with a reference implementation in [BCSwiftSecureComponents](https://github.com/blockchaincommons/BCSwiftSecureComponents).

---

These objects are normally random, but they are fixed for these test vectors:

* Symmetric key used for encryption: `526afd95b2229c5381baec4a1788507a3c4a566ca5cce64543b46ad12aff0035`
* Nonce for encryption: `4d785658f36c22fb5aed3ac0`
* Random generator for SSKR returns repeating sequence: `7eb559bbbf6cce2632cf9f194aeb50943de7e1cbad54dcfab27a42759f5e2fed518684c556472008a67932f7c682125b50cb72e8216f6906358fdaf28d3545532daee0c5bb5023f50cd8e71ec14901ac746c576c481b893be6656b80622b3a564e59b4e2`

## INDEX

1. [Seed 2 of 3](#TEST-VECTOR-1-Seed-2-of-3)
2. [String 3 of 5 with Additional Assertion](#TEST-VECTOR-2-String-3-of-5-with-Additional-Assertion)
3. [Seed 2-of-3 of 2-of-3](#TEST-VECTOR-3-Seed-2of3-of-2of3)

---

## TEST VECTOR 1: Seed 2 of 3

### Payload in CBOR Diagnostic Notation

```
300(   ; crypto-seed
   {
      1,
      h'59f2293a5bce7d4de59e71b4207ac5d2',
      2,
      1(2021-02-24T00:00:00Z),
      3,
      "Dark Purple Aqua Love",
      4,
      "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua."
   }
)
```

### Payload Enclosed in Envelope

```
CBOR(crypto-seed)
```

### GROUP 1 SHARE 1

#### UR

ðŸ‘‰ _The CBOR in a UR is never tagged, because the UR `type` field serves this purpose._

```
ur:
```

#### Tagged CBOR Binary

```

```

#### Tagged CBOR Diagnostic Notation

```
200(   ; envelope
   [
      200(   ; envelope
         201(   ; crypto-msg
            [
               h'',
               h'4d785658f36c22fb5aed3ac0',
               h'cf4ed704b5bb4ab157a4476f822c51dd',
               h'd8cb5820084b6c34533aec63a0d53eaa326bab8658a7774a858a6486beae803eba9547cb'
            ]
         )
      ),
      200(   ; envelope
         221(   ; assertion
            [
               200(   ; envelope
                  223(6)   ; known-value
               ),
               200(   ; envelope
                  24(   ; leaf
                     309(   ; crypto-sskr
                        h'b57e000100c10614e61968549a4cded201cb7b6589397498aacb07fad33d8660c5fec67efb'
                     )
                  )
               )
            ]
         )
      )
   ]
)
```

#### Tagged CBOR Annotated Binary

```
d8 c8                                    # tag(200)   ; envelope
   82                                    # array(2)
      d8 c8                              # tag(200)   ; envelope
         d8 c9                           # tag(201)   ; crypto-msg
            84                           # array(4)
               58b4                      # bytes(180)
                  
               4c                        # bytes(12)
                  4d785658f36c22fb5aed3ac0
               50                        # bytes(16)
                  cf4ed704b5bb4ab157a4476f822c51dd
               5824                      # bytes(36)
                  d8cb5820084b6c34533aec63a0d53eaa326bab8658a7774a858a6486beae803eba9547cb
      d8 c8                              # tag(200)   ; envelope
         d8 dd                           # tag(221)   ; assertion
            82                           # array(2)
               d8 c8                     # tag(200)   ; envelope
                  d8 df                  # tag(223)   ; known-value
                     06                  # unsigned(6)
               d8 c8                     # tag(200)   ; envelope
                  d8 18                  # tag(24)   ; leaf
                     d9 0135             # tag(309)   ; crypto-sskr
                        5825             # bytes(37)
                           b57e000100c10614e61968549a4cded201cb7b6589397498aacb07fad33d8660c5fec67efb
```

### GROUP 1 SHARE 2

#### UR

ðŸ‘‰ _The CBOR in a UR is never tagged, because the UR `type` field serves this purpose._

```
ur:
```

#### Tagged CBOR Binary

```

```

#### Tagged CBOR Diagnostic Notation

```
200(   ; envelope
   [
      200(   ; envelope
         201(   ; crypto-msg
            [
               h'',
               h'4d785658f36c22fb5aed3ac0',
               h'cf4ed704b5bb4ab157a4476f822c51dd',
               h'd8cb5820084b6c34533aec63a0d53eaa326bab8658a7774a858a6486beae803eba9547cb'
            ]
         )
      ),
      200(   ; envelope
         221(   ; assertion
            [
               200(   ; envelope
                  223(6)   ; known-value
               ),
               200(   ; envelope
                  24(   ; leaf
                     309(   ; crypto-sskr
                        h'b57e000101bc7a86f5f2f177a503420c8443ea7f1855aaf3218f00b1c2a2c8b86e964ce190'
                     )
                  )
               )
            ]
         )
      )
   ]
)
```

#### Tagged CBOR Annotated Binary

```
d8 c8                                    # tag(200)   ; envelope
   82                                    # array(2)
      d8 c8                              # tag(200)   ; envelope
         d8 c9                           # tag(201)   ; crypto-msg
            84                           # array(4)
               58b4                      # bytes(180)
                  
               4c                        # bytes(12)
                  4d785658f36c22fb5aed3ac0
               50                        # bytes(16)
                  cf4ed704b5bb4ab157a4476f822c51dd
               5824                      # bytes(36)
                  d8cb5820084b6c34533aec63a0d53eaa326bab8658a7774a858a6486beae803eba9547cb
      d8 c8                              # tag(200)   ; envelope
         d8 dd                           # tag(221)   ; assertion
            82                           # array(2)
               d8 c8                     # tag(200)   ; envelope
                  d8 df                  # tag(223)   ; known-value
                     06                  # unsigned(6)
               d8 c8                     # tag(200)   ; envelope
                  d8 18                  # tag(24)   ; leaf
                     d9 0135             # tag(309)   ; crypto-sskr
                        5825             # bytes(37)
                           b57e000101bc7a86f5f2f177a503420c8443ea7f1855aaf3218f00b1c2a2c8b86e964ce190
```

#### Tagged CBOR Diagnostic Notation

```
200(   ; envelope
   [
      200(   ; envelope
         201(   ; crypto-msg
            [
               h'',
               h'4d785658f36c22fb5aed3ac0',
               h'cf4ed704b5bb4ab157a4476f822c51dd',
               h'd8cb5820084b6c34533aec63a0d53eaa326bab8658a7774a858a6486beae803eba9547cb'
            ]
         )
      ),
      200(   ; envelope
         221(   ; assertion
            [
               200(   ; envelope
                  223(6)   ; known-value
               ),
               200(   ; envelope
                  24(   ; leaf
                     309(   ; crypto-sskr
                        h'b57e0001023bfe2bc0d44112e4d2fd7510c04251b0e1d34ea743096cf1181acb882ec95b2d'
                     )
                  )
               )
            ]
         )
      )
   ]
)
```

#### Tagged CBOR Annotated Binary

```
d8 c8                                    # tag(200)   ; envelope
   82                                    # array(2)
      d8 c8                              # tag(200)   ; envelope
         d8 c9                           # tag(201)   ; crypto-msg

               58b4                      # bytes(180)

                  4d785658f36c22fb5aed3ac0
               50                        # bytes(16)
                  cf4ed704b5bb4ab157a4476f822c51dd
               5824                      # bytes(36)
                  d8cb5820084b6c34533aec63a0d53eaa326bab8658a7774a858a6486beae803eba9547cb
      d8 c8                              # tag(200)   ; envelope
         d8 dd                           # tag(221)   ; assertion
            82                           # array(2)
               d8 c8                     # tag(200)   ; envelope
                  d8 df                  # tag(223)   ; known-value
                     06                  # unsigned(6)
               d8 c8                     # tag(200)   ; envelope
                  d8 18                  # tag(24)   ; leaf
                     d9 0135             # tag(309)   ; crypto-sskr
                        5825             # bytes(37)
                           b57e0001023bfe2bc0d44112e4d2fd7510c04251b0e1d34ea743096cf1181acb882ec95b2d
```

## TEST VECTOR 2: String 3 of 5 with Additional Assertion

### Payload in CBOR Diagnostic Notation

```
"It is the unspoken ethic of all magicians to not reveal the secrets. -- David Copperfield"
```

### Payload Enclosed in Envelope

```
"It is the unspoken ethic of all magicians to not reveal the secrets. -- David Copperfield" [
    note: "This could be vendor-specific data attached to the envelope."
]
```

### GROUP 1 SHARE 1

#### UR

ðŸ‘‰ _The CBOR in a UR is never tagged, because the UR `type` field serves this purpose._

```
ur:
```

#### Tagged CBOR Binary

```

```

#### Tagged CBOR Diagnostic Notation

```
200(   ; envelope
   [
      200(   ; envelope
         201(   ; crypto-msg
            [
               h'098c1382816ecdd218735dde9777ea9df95a07066f91c68f0ed50b74ee83fb6eddf1c64a7d8b2d9a037288c5adfae607f40784a733094b2451c7b7ab8e582048cadb67190e6e2f8e073e86afaa7104771d0f829fade736bc46e853098cd802',
               h'4d785658f36c22fb5aed3ac0',
               h'a435d31da4a8f6bc8fd4c0aac2bc3958',
               h'd8cb5820a89f163efd57002db11eb19b648c41fbc8f6e01e6f5807a5edc61cdb03e4563b'
            ]
         )
      ),
      200(   ; envelope
         221(   ; assertion
            [
               200(   ; envelope
                  223(6)   ; known-value
               ),
               200(   ; envelope
                  24(   ; leaf
                     309(   ; crypto-sskr
                        h'b57e00020059bbbf6cce2632cf9f194aeb50943de7e1cbad54dcfab27a42759f5e2fed5186'
                     )
                  )
               )
            ]
         )
      ),
      200(   ; envelope
         221(   ; assertion
            [
               200(   ; envelope
                  223(4)   ; known-value
               ),
               200(   ; envelope
                  24(   ; leaf
                     "This could be vendor-specific data attached to the envelope."
                  )
               )
            ]
         )
      )
   ]
)
```

#### Tagged CBOR Annotated Binary

```
d8 c8                                    # tag(200)   ; envelope
   83                                    # array(3)
      d8 c8                              # tag(200)   ; envelope
         d8 c9                           # tag(201)   ; crypto-msg
            84                           # array(4)
               585f                      # bytes(95)
                  098c1382816ecdd218735dde9777ea9df95a07066f91c68f0ed50b74ee83fb6eddf1c64a7d8b2d9a037288c5adfae607f40784a733094b2451c7b7ab8e582048cadb67190e6e2f8e073e86afaa7104771d0f829fade736bc46e853098cd802
               4c                        # bytes(12)
                  4d785658f36c22fb5aed3ac0
               50                        # bytes(16)
                  a435d31da4a8f6bc8fd4c0aac2bc3958
               5824                      # bytes(36)
                  d8cb5820a89f163efd57002db11eb19b648c41fbc8f6e01e6f5807a5edc61cdb03e4563b
      d8 c8                              # tag(200)   ; envelope
         d8 dd                           # tag(221)   ; assertion
            82                           # array(2)
               d8 c8                     # tag(200)   ; envelope
                  d8 df                  # tag(223)   ; known-value
                     06                  # unsigned(6)
               d8 c8                     # tag(200)   ; envelope
                  d8 18                  # tag(24)   ; leaf
                     d9 0135             # tag(309)   ; crypto-sskr
                        5825             # bytes(37)
                           b57e00020059bbbf6cce2632cf9f194aeb50943de7e1cbad54dcfab27a42759f5e2fed5186
      d8 c8                              # tag(200)   ; envelope
         d8 dd                           # tag(221)   ; assertion
            82                           # array(2)
               d8 c8                     # tag(200)   ; envelope
                  d8 df                  # tag(223)   ; known-value
                     04                  # unsigned(4)
               d8 c8                     # tag(200)   ; envelope
                  d8 18                  # tag(24)   ; leaf
                     78 3c               # text(60)
                        5468697320636f756c642062652076656e646f722d7370656369666963206461746120617474616368656420746f2074686520656e76656c6f70652e # "This could be vendor-specific data attached to the envelope."
```

```
200(   ; envelope
   [
      200(   ; envelope
         201(   ; crypto-msg
            [
               h'098c1382816ecdd218735dde9777ea9df95a07066f91c68f0ed50b74ee83fb6eddf1c64a7d8b2d9a037288c5adfae607f40784a733094b2451c7b7ab8e582048cadb67190e6e2f8e073e86afaa7104771d0f829fade736bc46e853098cd802',

               h'a435d31da4a8f6bc8fd4c0aac2bc3958',
               h'd8cb5820a89f163efd57002db11eb19b648c41fbc8f6e01e6f5807a5edc61cdb03e4563b'
            ]
         )
      ),
      200(   ; envelope
         221(   ; assertion
            [
               200(   ; envelope
                  223(6)   ; known-value
               ),
               200(   ; envelope
                  24(   ; leaf
                     309(   ; crypto-sskr
                        h'b57e000201734db81ef8c1f8db3eab00d875ebab1fcfdaabf30bde755068c7c000dfe0dc86'
                     )
                  )
               )
            ]
         )
```

### GROUP 1 SHARE 3

#### UR

ðŸ‘‰ _The CBOR in a UR is never tagged, because the UR `type` field serves this purpose._

#### Tagged CBOR Diagnostic Notation

```
200(   ; envelope
   [
      200(   ; envelope
         201(   ; crypto-msg
            [
               h'098c1382816ecdd218735dde9777ea9df95a07066f91c68f0ed50b74ee83fb6eddf1c64a7d8b2d9a037288c5adfae607f40784a733094b2451c7b7ab8e582048cadb67190e6e2f8e073e86afaa7104771d0f829fade736bc46e853098cd802',
               h'4d785658f36c22fb5aed3ac0',
               h'a435d31da4a8f6bc8fd4c0aac2bc3958',
               h'd8cb5820a89f163efd57002db11eb19b648c41fbc8f6e01e6f5807a5edc61cdb03e4563b'
            ]
         )
      ),
      200(   ; envelope
         221(   ; assertion
            [
               200(   ; envelope
                  223(6)   ; known-value
               ),
               200(   ; envelope
                  24(   ; leaf
                     309(   ; crypto-sskr
                        h'b57e000202188c2f85b486aa7b20d2a38d2f1d8871b50b26a9bc045a58403bda0c99e26841'
                     )
                  )
               )
            ]
         )
      ),
      200(   ; envelope
         221(   ; assertion
            [
               200(   ; envelope
                  223(4)   ; known-value
```

### GROUP 1 SHARE 4

#### UR

ðŸ‘‰ _The CBOR in a UR is never tagged, because the UR `type` field serves this purpose._

```
ur:
```

#### Tagged CBOR Binary

```

```

#### Tagged CBOR Diagnostic Notation

```
200(   ; envelope
   [
      200(   ; envelope
         201(   ; crypto-msg
            [
               h'098c1382816ecdd218735dde9777ea9df95a07066f91c68f0ed50b74ee83fb6eddf1c64a7d8b2d9a037288c5adfae607f40784a733094b2451c7b7ab8e582048cadb67190e6e2f8e073e86afaa7104771d0f829fade736bc46e853098cd802',
               h'4d785658f36c22fb5aed3ac0',
               h'a435d31da4a8f6bc8fd4c0aac2bc3958',
               h'd8cb5820a89f163efd57002db11eb19b648c41fbc8f6e01e6f5807a5edc61cdb03e4563b'
            ]
         )
      ),
      200(   ; envelope
         221(   ; assertion
            [
               200(   ; envelope
                  223(6)   ; known-value
               ),
               200(   ; envelope
                  24(   ; leaf
                     309(   ; crypto-sskr
                        h'b57e000203327a28f78261606f8160e9be0a621e899b1a200e6b209d726a89855269efe541'
                     )
                  )
               )
            ]
         )
      ),
      200(   ; envelope
         221(   ; assertion
            [
               200(   ; envelope
                  223(4)   ; known-value
               ),
               200(   ; envelope
                  24(   ; leaf
                     "This could be vendor-specific data attached to the envelope."
                  )
               )
            ]
         )
      )
   ]
)
```

#### Tagged CBOR Annotated Binary

```
d8 c8                                    # tag(200)   ; envelope
   83                                    # array(3)
      d8 c8                              # tag(200)   ; envelope
         d8 c9                           # tag(201)   ; crypto-msg
            84                           # array(4)
               585f                      # bytes(95)
                  098c1382816ecdd218735dde9777ea9df95a07066f91c68f0ed50b74ee83fb6eddf1c64a7d8b2d9a037288c5adfae607f40784a733094b2451c7b7ab8e582048cadb67190e6e2f8e073e86afaa7104771d0f829fade736bc46e853098cd802
               4c                        # bytes(12)
                  4d785658f36c22fb5aed3ac0
               50                        # bytes(16)
                  a435d31da4a8f6bc8fd4c0aac2bc3958
               5824                      # bytes(36)
                  d8cb5820a89f163efd57002db11eb19b648c41fbc8f6e01e6f5807a5edc61cdb03e4563b
      d8 c8                              # tag(200)   ; envelope
         d8 dd                           # tag(221)   ; assertion
            82                           # array(2)
               d8 c8                     # tag(200)   ; envelope
                  d8 df                  # tag(223)   ; known-value
                     06                  # unsigned(6)
               d8 c8                     # tag(200)   ; envelope
                  d8 18                  # tag(24)   ; leaf
                     d9 0135             # tag(309)   ; crypto-sskr
                        5825             # bytes(37)
                           b57e000203327a28f78261606f8160e9be0a621e899b1a200e6b209d726a89855269efe541
      d8 c8                              # tag(200)   ; envelope
         d8 dd                           # tag(221)   ; assertion
            82                           # array(2)
               d8 c8                     # tag(200)   ; envelope
                  d8 df                  # tag(223)   ; known-value
                     04                  # unsigned(4)
               d8 c8                     # tag(200)   ; envelope
                  d8 18                  # tag(24)   ; leaf
                     78 3c               # text(60)
                        5468697320636f756c642062652076656e646f722d7370656369666963206461746120617474616368656420746f2074686520656e76656c6f70652e # "This could be vendor-specific data attached to the envelope."
```

#### UR

ðŸ‘‰ _The CBOR in a UR is never tagged, because the UR `type` field serves this purpose._

```

```

#### Tagged CBOR Binary

```

```

#### Tagged CBOR Diagnostic Notation

```
200(   ; envelope
   [
      200(   ; envelope
         201(   ; crypto-msg
            [
               h'098c1382816ecdd218735dde9777ea9df95a07066f91c68f0ed50b74ee83fb6eddf1c64a7d8b2d9a037288c5adfae607f40784a733094b2451c7b7ab8e582048cadb67190e6e2f8e073e86afaa7104771d0f829fade736bc46e853098cd802',
               h'4d785658f36c22fb5aed3ac0',
               h'a435d31da4a8f6bc8fd4c0aac2bc3958',
               h'd8cb5820a89f163efd57002db11eb19b648c41fbc8f6e01e6f5807a5edc61cdb03e4563b'
            ]
         )
      ),
      200(   ; envelope
         221(   ; assertion
            [
               200(   ; envelope
                  223(6)   ; known-value
               ),
               200(   ; envelope
                  24(   ; leaf
                     309(   ; crypto-sskr
                        h'b57e0002048ff8ca9162b245fa4f726c277a5a723f69f58a2365f396fd052dd46f77a7c322'
                     )
                  )
               )
            ]
         )
      ),
      200(   ; envelope
         221(   ; assertion
            [
               200(   ; envelope
                  223(4)   ; known-value
               ),
               200(   ; envelope
                  24(   ; leaf
                     "This could be vendor-specific data attached to the envelope."
                  )
               )
            ]
         )
      )
   ]
)
```

## TEST VECTOR 3: Seed 2-of-3 of 2-of-3

### Payload in CBOR Diagnostic Notation

```
300(   ; crypto-seed
   {
      1,
      h'59f2293a5bce7d4de59e71b4207ac5d2',
      2,
      1(2021-02-24T00:00:00Z),
      3,
      "Dark Purple Aqua Love",
      4,
      "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua."
   }
)
```

### Payload Enclosed in Envelope

```
CBOR(crypto-seed)
```

### GROUP 1 SHARE 1

#### UR

ðŸ‘‰ _The CBOR in a UR is never tagged, because the UR `type` field serves this purpose._

```

```

#### Tagged CBOR Binary

```

```

#### Tagged CBOR Diagnostic Notation

```
200(   ; envelope
   [
      200(   ; envelope
         201(   ; crypto-msg
            [
               h'',
               h'4d785658f36c22fb5aed3ac0',
               h'cf4ed704b5bb4ab157a4476f822c51dd',
               h'd8cb5820084b6c34533aec63a0d53eaa326bab8658a7774a858a6486beae803eba9547cb'
            ]
         )
      ),
      200(   ; envelope
         221(   ; assertion
            [
               200(   ; envelope
                  223(6)   ; known-value
               ),
               200(   ; envelope
                  24(   ; leaf
                     309(   ; crypto-sskr
                        h'b57e12010015f5be9196237a9b2f14668a6065a5e89a0bc3c13eb91103f066202e391c622e'
                     )
                  )
               )
            ]
         )
      )
   ]
)
```

```
         d8 c9                           # tag(201)   ; crypto-msg
            84                           # array(4)
               58b4                      # bytes(180)
                  
               4c                        # bytes(12)
                  4d785658f36c22fb5aed3ac0
               50                        # bytes(16)
                  cf4ed704b5bb4ab157a4476f822c51dd
               5824                      # bytes(36)
                  d8cb5820084b6c34533aec63a0d53eaa326bab8658a7774a858a6486beae803eba9547cb
      d8 c8                              # tag(200)   ; envelope
         d8 dd                           # tag(221)   ; assertion
            82                           # array(2)
               d8 c8                     # tag(200)   ; envelope
                  d8 df                  # tag(223)   ; known-value
                     06                  # unsigned(6)
               d8 c8                     # tag(200)   ; envelope
                  d8 18                  # tag(24)   ; leaf
                     d9 0135             # tag(309)   ; crypto-sskr
                        5825             # bytes(37)
                           b57e1221016c639581c86356fff313c03307ee55174ca6033f2afcc55c660cacdeed5252c4
```

---

### GROUP 3 SHARE 3

#### UR

ðŸ‘‰ _The CBOR in a UR is never tagged, because the UR `type` field serves this purpose._

```
ur:
```

#### Tagged CBOR Binary

```

```

#### Tagged CBOR Diagnostic Notation

```
200(   ; envelope
   [
      200(   ; envelope
         201(   ; crypto-msg
            [
               h'',
               h'4d785658f36c22fb5aed3ac0',
               h'cf4ed704b5bb4ab157a4476f822c51dd',
               h'd8cb5820084b6c34533aec63a0d53eaa326bab8658a7774a858a6486beae803eba9547cb'
            ]
         )
      ),
      200(   ; envelope
         221(   ; assertion
            [
               200(   ; envelope
                  223(6)   ; known-value
               ),
               200(   ; envelope
                  24(   ; leaf
                     309(   ; crypto-sskr
                        h'b57e122102b10bb0642fed51672394f97e12d27437b3f585b59ee31ba32934e6c0d986d33c'
                     )
                  )
               )
            ]
         )
      )
   ]
)
```

#### Tagged CBOR Annotated Binary

```
d8 c8                                    # tag(200)   ; envelope
   82                                    # array(2)
      d8 c8                              # tag(200)   ; envelope
         d8 c9                           # tag(201)   ; crypto-msg
            84                           # array(4)
               58b4                      # bytes(180)
                  
               4c                        # bytes(12)
                  4d785658f36c22fb5aed3ac0
               50                        # bytes(16)
                  cf4ed704b5bb4ab157a4476f822c51dd
               5824                      # bytes(36)
                  d8cb5820084b6c34533aec63a0d53eaa326bab8658a7774a858a6486beae803eba9547cb
      d8 c8                              # tag(200)   ; envelope
         d8 dd                           # tag(221)   ; assertion
            82                           # array(2)
               d8 c8                     # tag(200)   ; envelope
                  d8 df                  # tag(223)   ; known-value
                     06                  # unsigned(6)
               d8 c8                     # tag(200)   ; envelope
                  d8 18                  # tag(24)   ; leaf
                     d9 0135             # tag(309)   ; crypto-sskr
                        5825             # bytes(37)
                           b57e122102b10bb0642fed51672394f97e12d27437b3f585b59ee31ba32934e6c0d986d33c
```
